kese namuth, loka kusalana tharagawaladi pakisthanaya samaga methek pawathi tharaga 7nma jayaganimata indiyawa samathwi thibenawa.me athara wissayi wissa loka kusalana tharagawaliye suparlig wataye shri lankawa muhunadena palamu tharagaya, saja hidi ada pawathwenawa.shri lankawa ehidi tharaga wadinne sudusukam labime tharagawaliyen suparlig watayata piwisi thawath kandayamak wana bangladeshaya samangayi.mita dina 12 kata pera shri lankawa saha bangladeshaya wissayi wissa loka kusalana tharagawaliye perahuru tharagayakata sahabhagiwu athara, in jaya ayath wuye shri lanka pilatayi.ada pawathwena tharagaya depile thun iriyawwenma daskam dakwana kridakayan wana wanindu hasaranga saha shakib al hasan athara satanak wanu athi bawayi krida wicharakayan penwa denne.kese namuth bangladesha pithikaruwan mella kirima sandaha shri lanka wegapandu balaaniya yodaganimata dasun shanaka uthsahayaka nirathawanu athi.dushmantha chamira menma payata kilomitara 145 ikmawu wegayakin pandu yawiya haki lahiru kumara ehidi ohuta sahaya wanu athi.shri lanka pile yowun danga pandu yawana kridaka mahish thikshana kayika aabadhayakata lakwima nisa ada tharagayata sahabhagiwima awinishchitha wi thibenawa.ese wuwahoth ee wenuwata akila dhananjaya kandayamata ekwanu athi.me athara wissayi wissa loka kusalana tharagawaliye eeye pawathi tharagawaladi oostreliyawa saha engalanthaya jayagrahana wartha kirimata samathwuna.dakunu aprikanu pila kadulu 9kata lakunu 118 k lesa sima kala oostreliyawa pandu wara 19yi pandu 4 kadi kadulu 5k dawi lakunu 121k labamin tharagaye jaya himikaragaththa.prabala batahira indiya kodew pila lakunu 55 kata dawalu engalanthaya pandu wara atayi pandu dekakadi kadulu hatharak dawi lakunu 56k labamin tharagaye jaya himikaragaththe siya inime thawath pandu 70k ithiriwa thibiyadiyi.
